Required_Skills: Good Knowledge on SAP Finance and Controlling module also knowledge on S4 HANA
8-12 years’ experience in SAP Finance / FICO module with a strong understanding of FICO and experience with SAP S/4HANA.
Preferred_Skills: Oracle certification in these modules will be an added advantage
Responsibilities: Deeply collaborate with business teams to understand financial processes, data requirements, and reporting needs.
Design and implement solutions that meet business needs with focus on industry best practices
Configure SAP FI and CO modules to meet organizational needs, including general ledger, accounts receivable, accounts payable, asset accounting, cost center accounting, and profitability analysis.
Integrate SAP FICO with other SAP modules (e.g., SD, MM, Asset) and third-party systems as required.
Manage assigned projects to achieve business requirements within agreed timelines and budgets.
Qualifications: Good Knowledge on SAP Finance and Controlling module also knowledge on S4 HANA
8-12 years’ experience in SAP Finance / FICO module with a strong understanding of FICO and experience with SAP S/4HANA.

Extensive experience in creating requirement specifications based on Architecture/Design/ Detailing of Processes for RICEFs, interface development, FICO enhancements, reports, data migration tools, and preparing FS/TS/test scripts.
